0: Close to water but could use a facelift
The only real disappointment was breakfast
We reserved two Queen beds and got 2 double beds maybe
He spoke to our guests very rudely when asking what they would like
Some annoying elevator and directions issue but overall a pleasant stay
We also had booked Alcatraz tickets in advance and due to ill health my husband was unable to make the visit
They certainly have the room for queen beds instead of double
But very impersonal and more like an institution than a welcoming hotel
Pillows were awful according to my husband and kid
Stuffy rooms and the hotel a bit dated
1: We stayed here for a night for a quick 2 day one night trip to SF
Good location everyody loves the Fishermans wharf
The rooms looked really nice and their were a lot of amenities but I did not get a chance to go to all of them
Close to the attractions like Alctatraz cruises and pier 39
Staff were very polite and helpful deco and rooms spotless outside pool lovely warm and great to dry off by the firepit
Also quite social and we met some lovely fellow travellers
5 minute walk to Pier 39 and Fishermans Wharf
Gym was basic and tidy and the heated pool was really nice
